altDescription: A collaboration with Alpha's Rare BBQ Sauce!  Brined for 24 hours then hardwood smoked, these wings are where smoke, sweetness, and sexiness come together. Morita peppers, roasted red bell peppers, tomatillos, and dark brown sugar build bold flavor, while apple juice and bourbon vanilla extract add a delicious undertone. To round it off, Carolina Reapers add a peek of heat.

description: House gochujang sauce, green onion, fried shallots

description: A complex blend of flavors with a base of Korean gochujang pepper paste, black garlic, and sesame, kicked up to 11 with ghost peppers and Carolina reapers.
